name: extract_workbook_summary3b
description: Extract a summarized structured overview of an Excel file, including sheet names, used ranges, header structures, and sample data values. The result is length-controlled and optimized for efficient processing. Supports timeout handling and summary length limits.

file_path.description: The absolute path to the Excel file to be summarized. Supported formats: .xlsx, .xls, .csv.

summary_limit_len.description: Maximum allowed character length for the extracted summary JSON (default 4096).

timeout_seconds.description: Maximum time in seconds allowed for extracting the summary (default 10 seconds).

return_mode.description: Return mode. 0: Only return the summary. 1: Return both the summary and elapsed time statistics.

debug.description: If true, raise detailed exceptions during extraction instead of catching errors.
